code:
// frontend/src/api/admin.js
const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL||'http://localhost:5000';// --- Fungsi Umum untuk Panggilan API ---
const fetchData=async function(url){let options=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:{};try{const response=await fetch(url,options);const data=await response.json();if(!response.ok){// Jika respons bukan 2xx, lempar error dengan pesan dari backend
throw new Error(data.message||'Terjadi kesalahan pada server.');}return data;}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching from ".concat(url,":"),error);throw error;// Lempar error agar bisa ditangkap di komponen
}};// --- API untuk Tahun Ajaran & Semester ---
export const getTASemester=async()=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/ta-semester"));};export const addTASemester=async(tahunAjaran,semester)=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/ta-semester"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({tahun_ajaran:tahunAjaran,semester:semester})});};export const setActiveTASemester=async id_ta_semester=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/ta-semester/set-active/").concat(id_ta_semester),{method:'PUT',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});};// --- API untuk Siswa ---
export const getStudents=async()=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/students"));};export const addStudent=async studentData=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/students"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(studentData)});};export const updateStudent=async(id_siswa,studentData)=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/students/").concat(id_siswa),{method:'PUT',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(studentData)});};export const deleteStudent=async id_siswa=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/students/").concat(id_siswa),{method:'DELETE',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});};// --- API untuk Guru ---
export const getTeachers=async()=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/teachers"));};export const addTeacher=async teacherData=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/teachers"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(teacherData)});};export const updateTeacher=async(id_guru,teacherData)=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/teachers/").concat(id_guru),{method:'PUT',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(teacherData)});};export const deleteTeacher=async id_guru=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/teachers/").concat(id_guru),{method:'DELETE',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});};// --- API untuk Kelas ---
export const getKelas=async function(){let id_ta_semester=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'';const url=id_ta_semester?"".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/kelas?id_ta_semester=").concat(id_ta_semester):"".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/kelas");return fetchData(url);};export const addKelas=async kelasData=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/kelas"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(kelasData)});};export const updateKelas=async(id_kelas,kelasData)=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/kelas/").concat(id_kelas),{method:'PUT',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(kelasData)});};export const deleteKelas=async id_kelas=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/kelas/").concat(id_kelas),{method:'DELETE',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});};// --- API untuk Mata Pelajaran ---
export const getMataPelajaran=async()=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/mapel"));};export const addMataPelajaran=async nama_mapel=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/mapel"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({nama_mapel})});};export const updateMataPelajaran=async(id_mapel,nama_mapel)=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/mapel/").concat(id_mapel),{method:'PUT',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({nama_mapel})});};export const deleteMataPelajaran=async id_mapel=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/mapel/").concat(id_mapel),{method:'DELETE',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});};// --- API untuk Tipe Nilai ---
export const getTipeNilai=async()=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/tipe-nilai"));};export const addTipeNilai=async tipeNilaiData=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/tipe-nilai"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(tipeNilaiData)});};export const updateTipeNilai=async(id_tipe_nilai,tipeNilaiData)=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/tipe-nilai/").concat(id_tipe_nilai),{method:'PUT',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(tipeNilaiData)});};export const deleteTipeNilai=async id_tipe_nilai=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/tipe-nilai/").concat(id_tipe_nilai),{method:'DELETE',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});};// --- API untuk Penugasan Siswa ke Kelas ---
export const assignSiswaToKelas=async assignmentData=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/siswa-kelas"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(assignmentData)});};export const getSiswaInKelas=async(id_kelas,id_ta_semester)=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/siswa-in-kelas/").concat(id_kelas,"/").concat(id_ta_semester));};// --- API untuk Penugasan Guru ke Mapel & Kelas ---
export const assignGuruToMapelKelas=async assignmentData=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/guru-mapel-kelas"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(assignmentData)});};export const getGuruMapelKelasAssignments=async id_ta_semester=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/guru-mapel-kelas/").concat(id_ta_semester));};export const deleteGuruMapelKelasAssignment=async id_guru_mapel_kelas=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/guru-mapel-kelas/assignment/").concat(id_guru_mapel_kelas),{method:'DELETE'});};// --- API untuk Capaian Pembelajaran (CP) ---
export const getCapaianPembelajaran=async function(){let id_mapel=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'';// Bisa filter by mapel
const url=id_mapel?"".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/cp?id_mapel=").concat(id_mapel):"".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/cp");return fetchData(url);};export const addCapaianPembelajaran=async cpData=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/cp"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(cpData)});};export const updateCapaianPembelajaran=async(id_cp,cpData)=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/cp/").concat(id_cp),{method:'PUT',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(cpData)});};export const deleteCapaianPembelajaran=async id_cp=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/cp/").concat(id_cp),{method:'DELETE',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});};// --- API untuk Kenaikan Kelas ---
export const promoteStudents=async(student_ids,target_kelas_id,target_ta_semester_id)=>{return fetchData("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/admin/promote-students"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({student_ids,target_kelas_id,target_ta_semester_id})});};
